name: Bounce Blade
description:
You're a swordsman(a white dot) who uses the weight of your weapon(rectangle) to maneuver in the air racking up aerial combos against jellyfish who progressively quicken with each kill.

You will need a Gamepad, start the game right out of the zip folder.

(A) Jump off orbs to replenish energy. 
(X) Slash your sword to change momentum(costing energy). You can also slash orbs expelling all your energy for a super powerful blast.

Kill as many enemies as you can before hitting the ground.

(hint: There is no double jump.)
